thread.title: BRIEF-Novocure Announces Q4 And FY17 Operating Statistics And Preliminary Revenue

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Novocure Announces Q4 And FY17 Operating Statistics And Preliminary Revenue
text:
47 PM / Updated 12 minutes ago BRIEF-Novocure Announces Q4 And FY17 Operating Statistics And Preliminary Revenue Reuters Staff 
Jan 9 (Reuters) - Novocure Ltd: 
* NOVOCURE ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 OPERATING STATISTICS AND PRELIMINARY REVENUE * Q4 2017 PRELIMINARY NET REVENUES OF $53.7 MILLION 
* Q4 REVENUE VIEW $53.3 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
